sys_atf_test.description:
'Use PagerDuty Teams' set to true. 'Create PagerDuty Team when provisioning Assignment Group' set to true. 'Provision current Assignment Group members into PagerDuty when provisioning Assignment Groups' set to true Group is not mapped to a PagerDuty. Do "Group provision to PD"
PagerDuty Team ID should be stored on the Assignment Group record in ServiceNow The corresponding PagerDuty Escalation Policy should be added to the newly created PagerDuty Team
sys_atf_test.name: A.Team creation with users assignation for not mapped group
sys_atf_test.sys_name: A.Team creation with users assignation for not mapped group
